item.title: Quality Minus Junk
item.description: Quality Minus Junk Asness, C. S., Frazzini, A., & Pedersen, L. H. (2019). Quality minus junk. Review of Accounting Studies, 24(1), 34-112. Review Quality Security : stocks that are safe, profitable, growing and well managed. high quality : higher prices on average, but not by a very large margin A quality-minus-junk(QMJ) factor that goes long high-quality stocks and shorts low-quality stocks earns significant risk-adjusted returns in the U.S. and globally across 24 countries price-to-book value \[ \frac{P}{B}=\frac{profitability \times payout-ratio}{required.
